entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 52 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
